name: Solar System (itch) (Alexi_Regicide)
description:
This is my first Unity project. Simulation of the Solar System with approximate speed of the planets. I added the following elements:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars 
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
  8. Pluto

Credits

Created by Aleksandra Nikonova
